messages.content: You are a hockey historian. Who won the Stanley Cup in 2005?
In 2005, the Stanley Cup was not awarded due to the NHL lockout.
You are a hockey historian. Who won the Stanley Cup in 2010?
In 2010, the Chicago Blackhawks won the Stanley Cup, defeating the Philadelphia Flyers 4–2.
You are a hockey historian. Who won the Stanley Cup in 2013?
In 2013, the Chicago Blackhawks won the Stanley Cup, defeating the Boston Bruins 4–2.
You are a hockey historian. Who won the Stanley Cup in 2016?
In 2016, the Pittsburgh Penguins won the Stanley Cup, defeating the San Jose Sharks 4–2.
You are a hockey historian. Who won the Stanley Cup in 2019?
In 2019, the St. Louis Blues won the Stanley Cup, defeating the Boston Bruins 4–3.
You are a hockey historian. Who won the Stanley Cup in 2021?
In 2021, the Tampa Bay Lightning won the Stanley Cup, defeating the Montreal Canadiens 4–1.
You are a hockey historian. Were there any teams that won back-to-back Stanley Cups?
Yes — notable streaks include the New York Islanders (1980–1983), the Pittsburgh Penguins (1991–1992, 2016–2017), and the Tampa Bay Lightning (2020–2021).
You are a hockey historian. Who won the Stanley Cup in the year right before the 2005 lockout?
In 2004, the Tampa Bay Lightning won the Stanley Cup, defeating the Calgary Flames.
You are a hockey historian. Has a team ever lost in the Final and won the next year?
Yes. The Edmonton Oilers lost in 1983 and won in 1984; the Pittsburgh Penguins lost in 2008 and won in 2009; and the Florida Panthers lost in 2023 and won in 2024.
You are a hockey historian. Can you list three teams that swept the Stanley Cup 4‑0?
Sure. The New Jersey Devils in 1995, the Colorado Avalanche in 1996, and the Detroit Red Wings in 1997 each swept the Finals 4–0.
You are a hockey historian. When did a Canadian team last win the Stanley Cup?
According to this data, the last Canadian team was the Montreal Canadiens in 1993, when they defeated the Los Angeles Kings.
You are a hockey historian. Which teams played in the Final in 1988?
In 1988, the Edmonton Oilers won the Stanley Cup, defeating the Boston Bruins 4–0.
You are a hockey historian. How many championships did the Blackhawks win in the 2010s?
The Chicago Blackhawks won three championships in the 2010s: 2010, 2013, and 2015.
You are a hockey historian. Who won the Cup in 2018?
In 2018, the Washington Capitals won the Stanley Cup, defeating the Vegas Golden Knights 4–1.
You are a hockey historian. Who won the Stanley Cup in 2022?
In 2022, the Colorado Avalanche won the Stanley Cup, defeating the Tampa Bay Lightning 4–2.
You are a hockey historian. Who won the Stanley Cup in 2024?
In 2024, the Florida Panthers won the Stanley Cup, defeating the Edmonton Oilers 4–3.
Who won the Stanley Cup in 2025?
In 2025, the Florida Panthers won the Stanley Cup, defeating the Edmonton Oilers with a series score of 4-2.
